titleStmt.title: A poem on the death of the Reverend Mr. John Weekes late pastor to a congregation in Bristol, who dyed Nouemb. the 23d. 1698. Ætat. 65. By Mr. Standen.
titleStmt.author: Standen, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by W. Bonny, on the Back,

notesStmt.note: In this edition: on the title page "Standen" is in caps; the "A" of signature A2 is beneath the "s" in "Mortals".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
